name: NSItemProviderRepresentationVisibility
desc: Specifications that control which categories of processes can see an item.

items.name: case all
items.desc: A representation visibility specification conferring item visibility to all processes.

items.name: case group
items.desc: A representation visibility specification confining item visibility to the app’s app group.

items.name: case ownProcess
items.desc: A representation visibility specification confining item visibility to the app that is the source of the item.

items.name: case team
items.desc: A representation visibility specification confining item visibility to processes created by the app’s development team.
